    • Method Detail

      • getInstanceFor

        public static SCUIWebValidationHelper getInstanceFor(java.lang.String applicationID)
        Returns validator instance for given application id. This method does not initializes adapters. applicationID application id validator instance

      • getInstanceFor

        public static SCUIWebValidationHelper getInstanceFor(javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
        Returns the validator instance. If no instance has been created, a new instance is created for for passes servlet context and returned. This method also initializes validation adapters. context servlet context validator instance #getInstanceFor(ServletContext, ClassLoader) #initValidationAdapters(ServletContext)

      • getInstanceFor

        public static SCUIWebValidationHelper getInstanceFor(javax.servlet.ServletContext context,
                                                     java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Returns the validator instance. If no instance has been created, a new instance is created for for passes servlet context and returned. This method also initializes validation adapters. context servlet context classLoader class loader which should be used to load adapter classes. validator instance #getInstanceFor(ServletContext) #initValidationAdapters(ServletContext, ClassLoader)

      • initValidationAdapters

        public void initValidationAdapters(javax.servlet.ServletContext context)
        Initializes all validation adapters using context parameters. Current class loader will be used to load adapter classes. This method is by default called if the instance was created using #getInstanceFor(ServletContext). context servlet context #initValidationAdapters(ServletContext, ClassLoader)

      • initValidationAdapters

        public void initValidationAdapters(javax.servlet.ServletContext context,
                                   java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Initializes all validation adapters using context parameters. This method is by default called if the instance was created using #getInstanceFor(ServletContext, ClassLoader). context servlet context classLoader class loader which should be used to load adapter classes. If null, class loader for this will be used. #initValidationAdapters(ServletContext)

        Validates the given input against registered rules. This method throws all validation exception occurred. context context for the input input input to be validated name name of the input inputType type of the input request HTTP request response HTTP response validated value SCValidationException validation exception

      • getValid

        public java.lang.String getValid(java.lang.String context,
                                 java.lang.String input,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String inputType,
                                 SCValidationErrorList errorList,
                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Validates the given input against registered rules. This method does not throw any validation exception. All validation exceptions are added to the passed error list. context context for the input input input to be validated name name of the input inputType type of the input errorList error list to be populated in case of validation exception request HTTP request response HTTP response validated value
